name: Tiptap
headline: Developer toolkit for building collaborative apps.
description: Tiptap is a suite of open source content editing and real-time collaboration tools for developers building apps like Notion or Google Docs. It’s used by thousands of businesses worldwide, including LinkedIn, GitLab, Axios, and Anthropic.

founders.name: Philip Isik, Founder
founders.description: Philip is the co-founder and co-CEO of Tiptap, where he is responsible for the company's strategy, sales, and business development. With a decade of industry experience, Philip's passion for creating intuitive and transformative digital experiences led him to grow Tiptap from an open source side project at his digital consultancy into a venture-backed startup.

founders.name: Sven Adlung, Founder
founders.description: Sven is a co-founder and lead frontend developer at Tiptap, where he brings over twenty years of experience in app and web development. Specializing in frontend development, he focuses on the Tiptap Editor and its cloud services.

founders.name: Patrick Baber, Founder
founders.description: Patrick is the co-founder and DevOps of Tiptap, which he started with five other founders in 2022. With more than a decade of experience, he is responsible for the IT infrastructure, defines the software architecture, and drives the mission to simplify the development of collaborative apps. Originally from East Germany, Patrick earned a degree in business economics.

founders.name: Nick Hirche, Founder
founders.description: Nick is a co-founder and lead UX/UI designer at Tiptap, where he is responsible for the visual appearance and product conception. With more than a decade of experience in the industry, he can quickly grasp complex problems and turn them into new product ideas. These are garnished with amazing design.

founders.name: Timo Isik, Founder
founders.description: Timo is a co-founder and lead backend developer at Tiptap where he mainly works on collaboration and cloud services. He holds over ten years of diverse experience in software engineering and specializes in the backend part of applications.

founders.name: Sebastian Schrama, Founder
founders.description: Sebastian is the co-founder and co-CEO of Tiptap. With over a decade of experience in the freelance and entrepreneurial world, he has honed his skills in finance and operations. His diverse expertise has shaped his role at Tiptap, where he navigates the company’s financial health and operational efficiency.

#  The editor suite to build products with
real-time synchronisation,  amazing content experience,  whiteboard collaboration,  real-time editing,  AI-powered content and  version control efficiency
real-tim
Tiptap is the headless and open source editor framework. Integrate over 100+ extensions and paid features like collaboration and AI agents to create the UX you want
[Sign up free](https://tiptap.dev/<https:/cloud.tiptap.dev/register>)[Try it live](https://tiptap.dev/<https:/templates.tiptap.dev/>)

Tiptap Suite
## Create your editor**with the features you want**
Tiptap's extension-based architecture puts you in control. Choose from a wide range of over 100+ Core, Pro, and Cloud extensions, or build and integrate your own.
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/645a9acecda2e0594fac6126/65baa412e8e00dbb65c3e145_editor-signet.svg)EditorOpen sourceBuild custom editors that align perfectly with your user's needs, offering flexibility and ease of use. Ideal for creating user-centric interfaces with minimal fuss.Learn more](https://tiptap.dev/</product/editor>)
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/645a9acecda2e0594fac6126/65baa3dc67b063a50545c95d_collaboration-signet.svg)CollaborationCloudTry for freeAllow your users to collaborate in any document and media. Integrate live carets and cursors to show who is typing, support offline editing and sync content.Learn more](https://tiptap.dev/</product/collaboration>)
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/645a9acecda2e0594fac6126/65baa3dc3f58a040b8249857_content-ai-signet.svg)Content AICloudPaid featureHelp your users perfecting their tone and crossing language barriers, Tiptap's Content AI transforms words into wonders. Write, refine, and captivate with ease.Learn more](https://tiptap.dev/</product/content-ai>)
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/645a9acecda2e0594fac6126/65baa3dc5d0a67adb5b7b76f_comments-signet.svg)CommentsCloudPaid featureIntegrate inline and document comments directly in your editor with Tiptap Comments. Ideal for collaboration, enabling real-time discussion and suggestions within the content.Learn more](https://tiptap.dev/</product/comments>)
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/645a9acecda2e0594fac6126/65baa3dc276ae556f0a6f4a9_documents-signet.svg)DocumentsCloudTry for freeSelf-host your documents for full control, or opt for our secure, scalable cloud. Create and manipulate your documents any way you want, whether you're flying solo or on Cloud 9.Learn more](https://tiptap.dev/</product/documents>)
[Explore all extensions](https://tiptap.dev/<https:/tiptap.dev/docs/editor/extensions/overview>)

## Code your editor**with everything you need**

generated_description:
### Tiptap: Revolutionizing Collaborative App Development

Tiptap is a developer toolkit founded in 2022, based in Berlin, Germany, with a mission to provide an open-source framework for building collaborative applications. 

Initially starting as a suite of real-time content editing tools, Tiptap is engineered for developers creating apps similar to Notion or Google Docs. Its robust features allow thousands of businesses worldwide—LinkedIn, GitLab, Axios, and Anthropic, among them—to enhance their collaborative workflows. This powerful toolkit is constantly evolving and gaining traction, particularly after being part of the Y Combinator Batch S23.

With a dedicated team of 15, Tiptap focuses on delivering a richly customizable, headless rich text editor that integrates over 100+ extensions. This flexibility allows developers to tailor their applications precisely to user needs, providing functionalities such as:

- **Real-time Collaboration:** Syncing documents and interactions as they happen.
- **Content AI:** Using AI to transform inline text, images, and documents for enhanced user engagement.
- **Comments and Feedback:** Facilitating discussions directly within the editing interface.
- **Document Management:** Choose between self-hosted solutions or scalable cloud options.

### Why Tiptap?

Tiptap is not just another editor. It's a plug-and-play solution that empowers businesses to create unique editor experiences without starting from scratch. Companies can deploy a fully-featured, customizable editor that is not only powerful but also user-friendly.

To further support enterprise needs, Tiptap provides dedicated support, extensive service-level agreements (SLAs), and ongoing development and integration assistance, with plans for SOC 2 compliance underway.

### Community and Support

As an open-source product, Tiptap thrives on community involvement. Developers can access comprehensive documentation, engage with others through Discord and GitHub, and benefit from a wealth of online resources.

### The Road Ahead

As Tiptap continues to grow, its vision remains clear: simplify the development of collaborative apps while providing the tools necessary for developers to build unique and engaging user experiences. Whether you're a startup looking to implement a simple editor or a large enterprise needing a full-fledged content management system, Tiptap presents a versatile solution.

Interested in joining the Tiptap journey? Check out their website [here](https://tiptap.dev/) and start building the collaborative app of your dreams today.
